snippet: The Obama administration announced an expanded list of Iranian companies and individuals that it said it would target to block their trading activities around the world.
abstract: Obama administration announces an expanded list of companies and individuals that it says it will target to block their trading activities around the world that are accused of helping Iran's nuclear and missile program; announcement appears timed to set stage for Senate Banking Committee hearing on the Iran nuclear talks and United States sanctions policies.

byline.original: By DAVID E. SANGER and MICHAEL R. GORDON

lead_paragraph: The Obama administration announced an expanded list of Iranian companies and individuals that it said it would target to block their trading activities around the world.

headline.main: White House Punishes More Firms Over Iran Sanctions
headline.print_headline: White House Punishes More Firms Over Iran Sanctions
